mapper.insert: insert into srm_order (mktName, goodImgUrl, goodOrderNum, sellerWXQQ, sellerOrderType, workerName, workingType, cashBackType, website, ASIN, recPrice, xdPrice, recCommission, xdJtUrl, xdPayedJtUrl, xdUser, xdDateTime, recDateTime, xdRequirement, signedJtUrl, remark, status, flag, orderCount, dayCount, isLP, isDHPZ, isHC, isHS, createTime, updateTime) values (#{condition.mktName}, #{condition.goodImgUrl}, #{condition.goodOrderNum}, #{condition.sellerWXQQ}, #{condition.sellerOrderType}, #{condition.workerName}, #{condition.workingType}, #{condition.cashBackType}, #{condition.website}, #{condition.ASIN}, #{condition.recPrice}, #{condition.xdPrice}, #{condition.recCommission}, #{condition.xdJtUrl}, #{condition.xdPayedJtUrl}, #{condition.xdUser}, #{condition.xdDateTime}, #{condition.recDateTime}, #{condition.xdRequirement}, #{condition.signedJtUrl}, #{condition.remark}, #{condition.status}, #{condition.flag}, #{condition.orderCount}, #{condition.dayCount}, #{condition.isLP}, #{condition.isDHPZ}, #{condition.isHC}, #{condition.isHS}, #{condition.createTime}, #{condition.updateTime})
mapper.select:
select t.* from srm_order t where 1 = 1
and t.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update srm_order set status = #{status} where id = #{id}

update srm_order
mktName=#{condition.mktName}, goodImgUrl=#{condition.goodImgUrl}, goodOrderNum=#{condition.goodOrderNum}, sellerWXQQ=#{condition.sellerWXQQ}, sellerOrderType=#{condition.sellerOrderType}, workerName=#{condition.workerName}, workingType=#{condition.workingType}, cashBackType=#{condition.cashBackType}, website=#{condition.website}, ASIN=#{condition.ASIN}, recPrice=#{condition.recPrice}, xdPrice=#{condition.xdPrice}, recCommission=#{condition.recCommission}, xdJtUrl=#{condition.xdJtUrl},
xdPayedJtUrl=#{condition.xdPayedJtUrl}, xdUser=#{condition.xdUser}, xdDateTime=#{condition.xdDateTime}, recDateTime=#{condition.recDateTime},
xdRequirement=#{condition.xdRequirement}, signedJtUrl=#{condition.signedJtUrl},
remark=#{condition.remark}, orderCount=#{condition.orderCount},
dayCount=#{condition.dayCount}, isLP=#{condition.isLP},
isDHPZ=#{condition.isDHPZ},
isHC=#{condition.isHC},
isHS=#{condition.isHS},
where id = #{condition.id}#
